website_summaries.verdict: This vacuum packs a lot of power into its small size and is lightweight enough to carry up and down stairs with ease.
pros: Converts to a hand vac for cleaning hard-to-reach areas
Hair removal tool for brush roll
Includes pet hair tool and crevice tool
Mounts to the wall for storage
Suitable for use on all floor types
cons: The dirt cup is small and needs to be emptied frequently

website_summaries.verdict: One of the lightest, thinnest uprights on the market. Perfect for those who don't want a scratch on their hardwood floors.
pros: One is more gentle for floors and throw rugs
The other speed can tackle even the thickest of rugs and carpets
– perfect for those with bad backs
Will suck up flecks or large piles of stuff (like Cheerios from messy kids)
Can morph into a handheld vacuum
cons: Vacuum doesn't stand up on its own
You'll need enough closet room to lean it against a wall

customer_reviews.title: Caught on Fire
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum would've gotten five stars from me until last night, when (what I assume was) the motor started burning up internally. It smoked for 30+ minutes after dousing it with water repeatedly. I had it for 10-11 months, and there was no indication of a problem beforehand -- the brush head was working/spinning properly, and I'd cleaned the filters recently. When I reported it via "Get Product Support", the only (automated) response was for me to buy replacement parts. Which is funny, because I guess that means I'd need to order every part except the handle.
customer_reviews.author: jay em

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts hahahaha
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the pictures; this plastic was cracking after 2 weeks. Spoke with the manufacturer & they told me I had to buy a whole new head. They don’t replace broken plastic pieces that are attached with a phillips screw., no really! The head was $80. Needless to say, I’m returning to amazon for a full refund. I’ll but a different brand even tho this was an amazing vacuum, shark lost my business over a plastic piece & a screw. Since my purchase I noticed amazon stopped selling this model...hummmm
customer_reviews.author: urnailgirlokc

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum for 5 months, then you can use it as a Blower
customer_reviews.text: Want a vacuum that blows air out? This one is for you. I bought and received this item in March of 2017. Worked fine, until May, when it started blowing air out, instead of vacuuming. The customer service at Amazon replaced the vacuum. This replacement vacuum worked until the beginning of January 2018. It too started to do the same thing as the first vacuum. When I called Amazon customer service, again, they stated that they could not help. So if you want a vacuum for 5 to 6 months, this one is for you
customer_reviews.author: Chetan Sawhney

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last in my house
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 dogs. This only lasted 4 months in my house before it stopped working well. I even cleaned the filters, but it would easily lose suction power. Since I bought it on Amazon and it was past the return date, I couldn't return it. I ended up buying the Dyson 8 Animal locally so if it loses suction and functionality again, I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with motorized pet tool that was clearly listed in description
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy online. You run the risk of not getting all of the accessories listed and then having to jump through hoops and waste your own time to get them. Several people have had this issue. Deceptive and dishonest tactics.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A mess. I spent the money on this machine ...
customer_reviews.text: A mess. I spent the money on this machine, hoping that it would keep functioning longer than previous vacuums I've owned. After four months the brush mechanism starts and stops during use and it's not picking up dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Murr

customer_reviews.title: Just disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo the vacuum worked great right out of the box. It had great suction when everywhere loved both rollers, actually threw away my other brooms, I have hard wood floors and rugs. Cut to to today.....2 months after buying the vacuum the roller heads no longer spin!!! Looked at manual....no help. Customer service said return to seller. Amazon said I am out of the return window. Soooo I have a vacuum that doesn’t have rollers that spin!!!! Useless. $250 down the drain for what equates to a two month vacuum rental.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wish I purchased new-Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: For the first two months this worked great. Then in month three it completely stopped vacuuming up anything. I would run the machine over the carpet and things would just get kicked back at me, the canister would be empty, and the motor would overheat. I finally just went to the Shark website and purchased a NEW vacuum that was only $70/$80 more and has a three year protection plan. I wish I didn't waste my money and just purchased new from the beginning. I contacted the company and the only thing they offered me was 16% off another purchase from them. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Shark Warranty/Customer Service is HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: For the first 5 months or so of owning this unit (during which use was very light as we only have carpet in the bedrooms of our home), I would have given this product 5 stars. HOWEVER, the roller brush stopped working 5 months in and upon calling Shark customer service, they offered us 50% off a replacement unit (another reviewer here stated the same thing). They stated that the 5-year warranty only covered the motor, but on the website, it states that "non-wearable components deemed defective" should be replaced under this warranty. The brush roller is not a replaceable component (this seems like filters). Horrible horrible customer service!!! I will never be purchasing a Shark product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzette A Medina

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this model because all the reviews indicated it included the maximum amount of accessories, when we received the unit, we immediately noticed that the accessories we're not in the box. We contacted Shark directly, two times, the first customer service representative took all the information and stated that the misssing parts would be sent at no charge, when we received the package, it did not have the missing components, we again contacted Shark, spoke with a second representative, she stated that the parts we're not included with this model, regardlesss of what all the advertising indicates. Very misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother. Get the better shark instead
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after one use. I have children and pets so I have to move things out of the way while vacuuming. This does not stand up on its own. I have an older shark vacuum that we used through the renovation of our home. Sucking up all sorts of debris- tile, drywall etc. the suction on my old shark surpassed the suction on this one. It barely made vacuum lines! I returned and got the other shark duoclean upright lift away which is phenomenal. Spend a little more and get the better shark because it is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Using the Shark with 2 large dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Shark stick vacuum. The 1st vacuum worked well, but developed a hole in tube where the head attaches to the stick; a replacement part is unavailable. However, I covered the hole with duct tape and still use the vacuum in an area that is seldom used except for occasional visitors. I bought the 2nd vacuum because it works well and is very versatile. We have two large dogs and I vacuum almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!THE WORST VACUUM EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its cannot stand on its own. I call Shark for a Kickstand and they said THEY DON'T HAVE one. Then , they tried to upset me to buy another Shark Vacuum with a kickstand. NO REFUND Offered. The Filter for these horrible machine need to be cleaned after only 1 minuet of use. Finally, it's not good for pet hair, as advertised. AVOID THIS PRODUCT LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Arathorn

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the marketing
customer_reviews.text: 1- Much heavier than I expected. 2-Dust cup is not small, it is tiny. Had to empty twice just vacuuming the kitchen and living room. 3-Almost impossible to control the 'power head' It swivels constantly at random. 4-power head is small, takes much longer to cover the surface area. 5-Because motor is in handle, you have hot air blowing at you the entire time. 6-Suction weaker than regular floor models.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Ray

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Initially this vacuum worked great for the first few months - bought this in November last year. By January, the "Brush Roll Indicator" turned on, and regardless of how often I cleaned the brush roll (without the tool that was apparently supposed to come with this vacuum, according to the manual), the light has never turned off. The vacuum heats up quite fast, so when I use it I can only vacuum for 10 minutes at a time before it will start to smell. Writing this review because the vacuum is just.. not working now. Waste of money - invest your savings in something higher quality!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a battery operated vacuum, but could not find one that would stay running for more than 10 min. at charge. For less money, took a chance on this after seeing the infomercials on this unit. Great suction power (cant beat 120v. power vs battery) I know still a pain to have to plug it in for a quick cleanup. But to me it worth the unlimited power. It is smaller then the house vac, and lighter. Really impressed with dual rotating rollers. came with all the necessary attachments. Another plus for me, this unit is always READY. Trade off buying here instead of on web site: you get one extra powered tool instead of 5 warranty.
customer_reviews.author: TJB

customer_reviews.title: An efficient grab when you need it
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this and have heard such great things about it. It's a good vacuum cleaner (fabulous if you compare it with hand held and not real heavy uprights) and it's light on the one hand but so top heavy that it's a bit unwieldy not just to use but especially to store. I can't imagine anyone being unpleased with the job it does but remember it's not a big Electrolux, it's an efficient grab when you need it kind of vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: JHD

customer_reviews.title: Messy to empty
customer_reviews.text: Emptying the bagless waste bin is VERY messy and requires you reach your hand into the mess. The dirt is attracted to plastic and requires you clean the outside of the container after emptying. It really is messy.
customer_reviews.author: wcl

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum really sucks!  hahahaha
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is so light and surprisingly powerful. It literally wants to walk away from you when you have it on full power. I put it to the test. First I vacuumed with my 5 year old Shark which still works very well, and then I went back over the the house with the DuoClean. The catch basket was amazingly full. The DuoClean also gets right up to the wall, and the headlight told me how much stuff I had been not getting under my dishwasher. I do have to confess that I wish it would stand up on it's own, but that is my only gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it...the only thing going is the suction & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I saw all these 4-5 stars and thought this would be great. 1. Doesn't stand up on it's own. 2. Pet hair gets tangled up in the roller and you have to cut it out. We have 1 dog and she gets groomed and brushed. Gross. 3. Very small, actually tiny receptacle for dirt accumulation. 4. The cord is really long, which is great, but it gets tangled every time even when you stretch it out. Never received any attachments? I guess other folks didn't either. Sadly a waste of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shark HV382
customer_reviews.text: The Shark HV382 is awesome! I prefer corded vacs so no hassle with charging batteries. This has great power on hard floors and carpets. The ability to take the bottom and middle portion off to use on the stairs is very handy. Or using just the vac and no base only the attachments is also very handy. When using the base it moves very easily, practically pulls itself. It’s got a good sized dust/debris compartment and the 2 air filters are easily rinsed/cleaned. We’ve had many vacs over the years and agree this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lakehawkes

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine never worked well, didn’t pick up well, was very noisy making sucking slurpy sounds while running. It always seemed like the bag was full, it never got full in weeks of use. I’m ready to watch it march into the sunset. Should have give the fact that it won’t stand up more credibility. Every time I push the lever to unlock the handle would come out and would have to lock it back down, so much bad with this 💩 Pretty much have hated this machine and unfortunately missed the window to return 😩
customer_reviews.author: Whatsthatsound

customer_reviews.title: very good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Superior suction, cleans well on carpet and tile floors. Long cord means I can clean 1 rooms without moving plug, long cord means I have to be careful not to get the cord wrapped around my legs and feet. Steering is a bit awkward and sometimes requires 2 hands to change direction. Because the weight is all at the top of the handle this adds to the awkwardness and also means the hot exhaust blows on you if the handle is close to your body. We don't have pets so I can't rate it for cleaning up hair. I am elderly and this is the lightest weight vacuum I could find, but my age may contribute to the awdwardness.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Hard Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Picks up litter and cat food rather than throwing it around the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Linkcha

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: This broke at one month!!! Doesn't pick anything up and I cleaned it appropriately!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMomma

customer_reviews.title: Missing items from description
customer_reviews.text: According to item description, this vacuum should have come with : Accessories Included: Handheld Vacuum, Motorized Floor Nozzle, Wand, Onboard Storage Clip, 12" Crevice Tool, Pet Multi-Tool and Wall mount. Also listed under product information on the mobile app it states Included components: True Pet Mini Motorized Brush, under appliance wand, dusting brush, duster crevice tool, upholstery tool, onboard storage clip, accessory bag, wall mount. This item didn't include: True Pet Mini Motorized Brush, under appliance wand, dusting brush, duster crevice tool, upholstery tool, onboard storage clip, accessory bag, I took a screen shot of the product information where it states that those items should be included. Wouldn't buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Agile Vacuum with a bad warranty
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works pretty well when it works. Hardwood and tile - very well, carpet pretty good. What soured me was the warranty experience. Just like others here, the bottom brush unit failed after 7 months. No problem - under warranty - except ONLY the motor is covered under the warranty. Shark was offered to replace it for $75. I balked that it was under warranty. They offered me 1/2 price. I took it vs. buy a whole new vacuum, but will not buy another Shark product. Deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Odell

customer_reviews.title: Shark product is  horrible
customer_reviews.text: I paid 325$ for this Vacuum and the product stopped working after 1 year... Even though the product is under 5 year warranty , when I called the customer service , they said the part that is not working is not under warranty... Guys don't buy this product , the customer service doesn't care about the product.... they have no respect for the customer , they said you can go ahead and escalate to anyone you want but there is nothing that they can do...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but no longer includes the advertised accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum but no longer includes the advertised accessories. You don't get the motorized upholstery brush, the under appliance tool or the accessory bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this vacuum. Lightweight, easy to move around and store. The carpet setting will help pull the vacuum forward so there’s less effort needed to push, not that it’s difficult to begin with. Easy to clean out/empty. Love the headlights on it; they really make it 100 times easier to see everything on the floor. We have two dogs and no problems with getting the dog hair up with this vacuum. Couldn’t recommend enough
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dean

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for almost 2 years during which time I did not use it very heavily and cleaned it after every other use, filters, head, and roller. I simply detached the head today for some counter cleaning and it wouldn't reattach. After trying to disassemble the handle to see what the hang up was I noticed there was no way to remove the handle and as many reviews have stated the parts are not warrantied. So disappointed, the device is useless. Will never buy a shark again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Falkin

customer_reviews.title: It gave up after a few months. Dust collecting container too small.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for about 7 months. We only have one room of carpet and have to empty the dust container after vaccuming before we can tackle the rest of the house. The filters take a long time to dry, and we clean them fairly regularly. We have two short haired dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Geda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: NOT worth the money. Leaves lint everywhere. Worked for about 2 months then started get roller clogged with lint and hair. I am forever taking it apart and cleaning it out. One person household and the dog hair is not the issue. It’s lint from rugs and dirt That this will not pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Meier

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on an infomercial at 1 am. Had to buy it, but on Amazon. I've gone through many vacuums, including a robotic one, and this one does the best job by far and easiest to use and comes with all the accessories. Great on carpet, the rollers pick up all the dust and hairs, and even great on hardwood or tile. No annoying loud humming sound you get from other vacuums when on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderOKC

customer_reviews.title: consumer reports loves it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is GREAT!. So easy to put together, better suction that the upright I had bought and tons of cool extensions and accessories. I learned about this product on consumer reports, it got a fabulous rating. I have only have it a week but I love to use it. I have been vacuuming everything.
customer_reviews.author: Brook S. Teal

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Use this at our office which is a painted concrete floor - doesn’t scratch paint but yet still makes them look spotless and polished almost. Use at my apartment. And FYI, I shed like no other girl. It gets it all. I have a small 1-br apartment, but it gets so much pulled up, I always have to empty it twice before I’m done. It’s just a good vacuum. It’ll pull up the dirt that gets deep in carpets from every day use. Only complaint is that hair gets stuck on the brush roll and is a pain to get off. And it’s bagless- I’d prefer to buy bags and not have to clean the dang thing monthly
customer_reviews.author: Kuser2008

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it is lightweight. Easy to move around, take apart. Makes cleaning my stairs so much easier and goes from low profile rugs to floor great. I love my last Shark vacuum. This one's suction not as great and ability to get dirt close to baseboard is difficult. You have to use the wand. Don't think I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Savano

customer_reviews.title: Broken/defective when received!
customer_reviews.text: I had looked forward to using it, but was never able to as the handheld unit would not connect to the wand part of the vacuum. I HAD TO PAY $42.18 TO RETURN A DEFECTIVE VACUUM! I will be happy to update this review if I am refunded the shipping in addition to the cost of the vacuum, but otherwise I will NEVER use this vendor again!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: terrible and useless warranty
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 and a half years of use the motor wouldn't work, that was covered on the warranty and they shipped me out a new motor. A few months later we noticed a crack on the hose of the vacuum. After a long discussion with customer service I was told that this was not covered by the warranty. So I had to buy a new head for 100$. I asked what was covered and I was told only the electrical components. This warranty is pretty much useless. Buy a better vacuum from a more reputable brand. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ashe

customer_reviews.title: This model is limited on accessory choices for purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this awesome Shark DuoClean Rocket Corded Ultralight vacuum HV 382 a five star. There are no motorized brush accessory or other Shark Rocket accessories for this particular model. Had I known that I wasn't able to buy accessories for this model, I would have bought the Shark Rocket Pro which had all of the great accessories that I need. I picked a newer model of the same "type" of Rocket but the accessory connections changed from HV320 to the HV382. It is ridiculous that features were changed between similar vacuums and the company offered no accessories to the HV382 other than the standard extension and cheap upholstery brush.
customer_reviews.author: Trivi

customer_reviews.title: After 5 months it stopped working!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the vacuum of my dreams for the first few months! The suction was so strong I didn't even have to push it. It was easy to clean out and it worked on the hard floor and carpet. I love the attachments. BUT, it hasn't even been 5 months and it no longer works. The dirt gets stuck in the hole so it doesn't reach the emptying cup. I've cleaned out the brush roll, the filters, and everything but it still doesn't work. I don't think it's the suction, because the other attachments work okay, but the main vacuum attachment just pushes dirt around. I'm very frustrated, especially after spending so much money on a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy to take apart for cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shark rocket vacuums. Very hard to find parts for versions that are a few years old. So I bought this new one. It works well but the orange roller gets stuck a lot with my dogs hair. Maybe that’s what it is intended for but I have to take it apart often to unclog it. I have 1 chocolate lab and I do vacuum 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Suction not well for my hardwood/vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what I expected. My mother has a shark duo clean, slightly newer as it bends for hard to reach and I bought this model expecting similar power and mobility..this vacuum does not clean or suction how I'd expect for my hardwood and rugs. I end up having to sweep back over with a dustpan. Also if you move the vacuum wrong while running it, it spits back what you've vacuumed. Don't know if mine is just defective or why this is such a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Buyazon

customer_reviews.title: Spend money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for almost two years now, and it has gone to trash. It’ll pick things up off the floor, to only drop it all again once you turn the vacuum off. It’s horrible at picking up animal hair. Spend your money else where! When buy a product for over 200 dollars at the time, I expect it to last longer than a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Megan King

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Being corded I expected it to be a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Bought it relying on reviews - should have known better. Being corded I expected it to be a little more powerful. This is just a glorified dustbuster. Does decent job picking up crumbs and litter that cats tracked out of the box, but really has very little suction power. NOT an all around vacuum cleaner but only a secondary one. If you have rugs or carpets, get a regular Shark navigator type. I have a regular Shark Navigator, that actually cleans rugs. This one is weak.
customer_reviews.author: chilanzar

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Vac!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is this is awful... I have 2 pets and area I vacuum is 6x8 rug-low pile. In addition this vac does not stand up on its one. Most frustrating vacuum I've ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.author: SPP

customer_reviews.title: Nice little vacuum but I wish it had retractable cord
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for more than a year. I have a small studio apartment, so it should be a perfect fit for the space. Strong suction for a small vacuum Very mobile and versatile I don’t like having to unwrap and wrap the power cord. I wish it had a retractable power cord. The attachments are rather cheap and have broken within one year.
customer_reviews.author: Rian R vanderMaden

customer_reviews.title: Will be updating as I own
customer_reviews.text: First impression update as of 10/17/18: Assembly was simple and to see how well it worked I first vacuumed with my old vacuum (Dyson) and used this Shark right after and it vacuumed up SOOOO much junk! (I attached a video showing how much was sucked up) Used it on my linoleum kitchen and dining room and it worked very well also. Didn't kick anything back into my feet. I didn't think I'd care for the attached light but it was very helpful even when I had lights on at the time. Also this is the first vacuum that can fit underneath my china cabinet and edges of my couch. So far I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Presley Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be quick to buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry that I made this purchase. It never Really worked and didn’t get any satisfaction from the company. They had me take it apart and said there is nothing they can do.
customer_reviews.author: amurph

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, for the 1-1/2 yrs it lasted (still recommend it)
customer_reviews.text: We loved this model. Awesome for vacuuming furniture, carpet, hardwood floors. The reason I’m disappointed but still leaving 5 stars? It lasted only 1-1/2 yrs... because I feel its somewhat our fault. While we cleaned the filters monthly-ish. We rarely cleaned the base (hair would bind up in the roller so bad), that sometimes you could smell something burning or notice a loss of suction. Then we would clean the rollers... I think after so long the motor burns out working so hard to create suction &, turn the rollers that it will burn out if not properly cleaned, monthly. The base (where the rollers are most importantly), takes the longest and I feel like is the most neglected.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very easy to use. Only downside is the cord. Preferred cordless but due to cost went with this product. So easy to use and clean. Versatile to clean sofa and stairs. Used it to clean air vents set up high on the ceiling. Light weight allows me to use easily, even while pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineB

customer_reviews.title: Some Outstanding Features
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful suction. Would loved to have kept it for that reason. Also loved the fact that it. Was light weight and had a very long cord. However it had extra attachments that I felt I may never use. Also the handle was uncomfortable for my hands. I have rheumatoid arthritis. It does not stay upright which I knew in the beginning. So the many attachments and the uncomfortable handle were my reasons for returning my purchase. I am presently considering a Shark Lift Away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I expected for a "pet" vacuum. It has good suction and easy to get under beds to clean but instead of ending up in the vacuum cup the majority of the pet hair winds around the brush and has to be manually removed. My dyson does the same thing, was just hoping the Shark would have figured out a way to eliminate the problem.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a light vacuum to keep in my basement kitty litter free. What makes this vacuum work so well... aside from the fact that it sucks (pun intended), the light on the front helps me locate every piece of litter on my floor. The ONLY thing that I do not like about it is that the release to remove the debris from the container get filthy every time I dump it. I think its just the way it opens. It can get messy. Aside from that I've been happy with this purchase. The cord is long, it has a couple storage options and it propels itself quickly and is easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fairly effecient
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum head is fairly small, but easy to maneuver. I don't like the way the attachments attach to the handle. They are difficult to pull off and are always in the way. I hoped this would be a better quick clean up for when I don't want to hassle with the full size vac. It does a fairly good job. Gets to the edges pretty well. The unit is fairly heavy in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: M Buyer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT. DON'T GO NEAR IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NOTHING TO RECOMMEND THIS. USELESS. ANNOYING. POOR DESIGN FOR ANY ACTUAL USE. A MAN DESIGNED THIS THING. WEIGHT IN USE IS ALL ON UPPER BODY. AND ZERO POWER OR SUCTION WHER IT ACTUALLY COUNTS. WHY DON'T MANUFACTURERS OF HOME PRODUCTS CHECK IN WITH WOMEN ON DESIGN, OR HAVE WOMEN DESIGNERS????
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Yeats, Product Designer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it! The only downfall is that it can’t just stand upright or lean against the wall without falling most of the time (which is quite annoying). Other than that it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a vacuum that picks up pine needles and other debris that the dog drags in. That front roller really makes a difference. Great suction power, very quick and easy to convert from floor to wand vacuum to get into places that are impossible to reach. Pros - picks up all kinds of debris that other vacuums leave behind - gets under sofas and beds easily - converts to a wand vacuum quickly and easily - the narrower vacuum head is great and gets in places that other's don't - it did include several brush attachments Cons - it's top heavy so it can't stand up on it's own. I think a minor trade off for all the other benefits
customer_reviews.author: CompuGeek

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would of bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It doesn't take up a lot of room & is lightweight. The dust container isn't that big but our place isn't the biggest place so it works perfect for us. I love that you can pop out the beater bar out, its so easy to remove hair & keep it clean, which has been a problem with other vacuums. Plus its easy to switch from carpeting to hardwood just by moving the on switch. All the attachments are awesome, especially the wand that goes underneath the stove. I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Tsparks31

customer_reviews.title: It does stand up.
customer_reviews.text: Take the motor off and clip it to the bottom. Many users don't see this aspect. Very versatile and I like there are no expensive battery replacements like the Dyson. The beater bar gets carpet clean. The attachments work great with the pole or without! I love that they all clip on the pole too. My 6 year old was able to use it. Big bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction, though TOP HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Love the suction power of this vacuum. That's what I bought it for, but it has only one small glitch. I can't leave it standing while moving anything. It falls over because it is top-heavy. Fitting it together is easy, but takes a small bit of thinking about it when I first got it. Even with these remarks, I would buy it again! It picked up much more dirt in my carpets than my previous (yet old) Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: TikiFin

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This thing is impressive. Pulled two cats worth of cat hair out of my carpet in a matter of minutes. Lightweight, easy to use and has tons of attachments for different uses. I have really long hair and one of the problems I had with my old vac was hair winding around the roller requiring a screwdriver to disassemble enough to cut the hair off the roller. This one, the roller will just pop out with a click of a button so you can easily clean it. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight this is. Only negative is, it only goes under beds until you reach the wider top. I just have to move around to all side to clean under beds. It works great under couches. On hardwood floors. Get around edges very nice. Just make sure to lay it down. I leaned it on a chair for a second and it slid on wood floors and fell. Thankful upper canister didn't break, just be careful. Otherwise, it does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pick Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his apartment but tested it in my house. We have a dog. I could not believe the pet hair it picked up and this was only a day or so after I had done a regular vacuum with my Orek. The canister was full of pet hair. I may get one for myself! Can't comment on durability at this point. I do see as others have said that it is top heavy. So may not be good for someone who has arthritis or and elderly person without strength in hands. It also will not stay up on its own. it comes with something to affix to wall to hang it on.
customer_reviews.author: wint

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but this vacuum exceeds my expectations! It replaced a dyson ball, that I had. The suction is fantastic, it has 2 levels of power, 1st is manual push & 2nd is auto. It isn't heavy at all and I love the fact it turns into a hand held with the push of a release. Storing is great, as the unit comes apart or you can hang on a wall. I was amazed at the dust and hair it picked up on the 1st run!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I had planned on buying a Dyson Cordless for the convenience but the reviews on the Shark DuoClean (Consumers Reports, Consumers Search) were just too much better to ignore. I like that it was light and easy to maneuver so that other members of the family would be inclined to use it. It was easy to assemble and had serious suction on floors and carpets (that's the benefit of the cord). I could change from floor to rug without taking my hand off the handle. The cord is plenty long so I can vacuum for awhile without having to change plugs. I highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous ConsumerTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Does not leave an “almost polished” finish
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty disappointed in this vacuum. The pictures show it picking up fine dust and the description says “almost polished finish” but that is simply not true. It is fine at picking up debris and some dust but the floors do not look clean without mopping after. It is also a pain that it is back heavy and can’t stand on its own. It is light weight and very easy to maneuver so I will keep it but it is not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Reece Family

customer_reviews.title: Works FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and tried it out today and works excellent! Snaps together and was a breeze. She has tile flooring, carpet and an area rug and did a great job moving to each section with ease. I have another make of Shark stick but like this one much better than my own. I don’t have to remove a separate part to empty the dirt bin which is way more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Roxann

customer_reviews.title: Good 2nd vac
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a model referb HV 382 but was shipped a HV 380. Not sure what the difference is. It does not do quite as good a job on carpets as my other vac, a canister but it's not bad. It's lightweight which is a plus as well as having one setting for bare floors and carpet so you're not always switching between the two. You do have to empty the dirt container quite often but it is fairly simple to do. Good with pet hair LED lights are nice to see the dirt. cord is very long. Easy to get under furniture as powerhead is low in height.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Quite, ready to work and work
customer_reviews.text: Is there anything that hasn't been mentioned about this? At first I thought it looked like a toy, wouldn't get the job done. Hey, I was so wrong. It sucks in whatever is in it's way. You wouldn't expect by looking at it how easy it turns. Quite, easy to operate, not sluggish or clumsy like bigger, more expensive vacuums out there. The dirt collecting box is kind of small but that's enough to go thru 1 bedroom apt. It has written pointing signs all over so you wouldn't have and difficulties to open the trash box, access filter and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Farkhod

customer_reviews.title: not powerful
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner gets clogged almost instantly. I had high hopes with the pricing. Still not worth the price even though I purchased it on prime day. My place is a mess and I need a new vacuum. Should’ve returned it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Priessnitz

customer_reviews.title: six months in the spring six months in the fall
customer_reviews.text: adopted a dog, dogs have hair, dog have a lot of hair, dogs lose a lot of hair. dogs make your house smell like dog. but this and stop all that. except adopting dog you can still do that.
customer_reviews.author: j.m giggity

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy use and you'd use it everyday if necessary.
customer_reviews.text: The weight distribution is heavier on the top where you grip the product; however, being able to get under the bed, night stands, dresser, dining room chair (instead of having to move them), TV console, coach, etc. truly makes up for this one design flaw. The amount of dust, dander, and dirt it pulls up is wonderful and storage is the best! Removing the brush to clean out long hair strands that wrap around it is AMAZINGLY easy. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte T

customer_reviews.title: Post would not click together, tech support was no help.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product, went to put together and the post would not click into place no matter what you did, it seemed like a defected part and a stupid way to connect the pieces. Called their tech support with no solution. Just sent back to Amazon and plan to purchase something other than a Shark, they do not seem to have very good quality assurance in their products. Too bad because it had good reviews, just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Graczyk

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and maintain. I bought it for about 50 percent off in good condition and no accessories. The previous accessories I had work on it so that’s exciting. Its extremely powerful and doesn’t blow everything up in the air. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase. I will update if it does last long but first impression it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Floor nozzle broke down after 10 months of a tidy use and this part is not covered by warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is very weak and whimsy. Floor nozzle broke down after 10 months of a tidy use. Brushes suddenly stoped spinning and melted the floor nozzle body. The official retailer Shark refused to service this accident by warranty! The vacuum is not cheap, such accidents could be covered by warranty. Will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The head size made it perfect for cleaning carpeted stairs
customer_reviews.text: This product made a big difference in our house cleaning. Very adaptable. The soft red roller brush really seems to make a difference. The head size made it perfect for cleaning carpeted stairs. Far superior to using a hose attachment on a full sized vacuum. Tested it against our hoover wind tunnel and this product easily won. It's small head does make the job take longer, but definitely recommend for those in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Feel Free to Zip Around
customer_reviews.text: Love this Shark Rocket cleaner! We zip around and around and it picks it up. Our dust bunnies usually have names, not anymore! They're gone is a minute and we love it. It is light weight and doesn't feel heavy when you are zipping around cleaning up. Fit under the bed and around our dining room like a little piece of magic! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McClure

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, Love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, Love, love this vacuum, Perfect for a city high rise condo, where space is a premium. It has amazing power for such a small, light weight vacuum. The floors practically vacuum themselves, with your direction. I like the feature that it can be used as a hand vac or a vacuum. I hung the mounting bracket in a closet & store it with the power cord wrapped separate from the floor vac. The hand vac is ready to use at any minute, & when I want to vacuum the floors it takes 2sec to assemble. This was/is the perfect vacuum for me, very versatile - I hope y'all enjoy it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with "onboard" hair removal tool
customer_reviews.text: The instructions don't say it's an accessory. They say open up the vacuum head and there it is. Well mine didn't come with one. They say it's "onboard". But when I called Shark they said, oh no, it's not shown in the picture as being "in the box". Just seems like such a small thing to argue with a customer about. Never mind. It seems like a nice vacuum, just received so not much feedback yet. Just wonder about what else the company doesn't do.
customer_reviews.author: Academy Village

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt stand upright! Bad design...
customer_reviews.text: Good suction. Easy to clean. Although fairly light, it is quite top heavy. This makes it a bit hard to vacuum some surfaces because the full weight of the vacuum is being pushed around and back and forth with your arm holding it up, rather than like a canister where you are only holding the hose. But the worst feature is that you cant stand it up. This makes it unwieldly when trying to remove dust cup or wrap up the cord. This i feel is a real design issue and condidering returningbit gorvthis annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Quality, powerful stick vac that stores small
customer_reviews.text: I was already a fan of Shark, reliable brand with good quality vacuums for reasonable price. This is my first stick vacuum and I'm impressed. Very powerful, picks up fine dust and larger debris - really surprised how much it got out of my carpet! Works well on all my floors. Easy to access and clean/detangle brushes. Dust trap opens easily and filters seem easy to clean. Really pleased by how small it stores. Does not feel cheap: the main tube is metal and all plastic parts are heavy duty, but I bought 2yr protection anyway. If you're looking for a reliable, quality stick vac that stores small, I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: If you are into up-right (not cordless) vacuums.. that are light, take up very little space, is super easy to take apart to clean, vacuum 7.5/10 on medium-thicker carpeted surfaces and 9/10 on hard floor surfaces...than this model is for you. If you have stairs in your house, this will not be the ideal choice...the brushes that this model comes with makes it harder to adjust to clean the stairs and the brush heads interfere with the suction (unless you have uncarpeted stairs - the brush heads will work). Otherwise I'd give this 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very powerful! I used it on tile, hardwood, carpet, and rugs. It works great on every surface. It does lift the ends of my rugs so just be careful with that. It is of great quality and comes with 2 attachments. It also has lights to make it easier to see what you are cleaning.It is lightweight but is top heavy so it cannot stand up on its own. You ave to lean it against something. But overall I reccomend this vacuum! It was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Super user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Super user friendly, easy to assemble, compact, not too heavy. The light on it is a huge help! We are currently in the middle of building our house and living in the middle of a construction zone means endless amounts of dirt and mud getting tracked inside. Add a golden retriever to the mix, and you develop acute anxiety over the thin layer of dirt that covers everything, every day. I’ve tried other vacuums that shall remain nameless, and they did nothing but move the dust, dog hair, and dirt around. This Shark is an amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay N Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I ever had. The dual rollers and strong suction clean better than my old upright. It is also quieter. Easy to move around and get under things. The attachments that came with it are very useful. I put up the wall mount and the attachment bag and the vacuum hang out of the way and take up very little space. I would recommend this vacuum for everyone. Had my old vacuum for twelve years, lets see how long this last!
customer_reviews.author: squan5405

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this awesome vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this! I have a Hoover and literally vacuumed the day before my Shark arrived. After a quick re-clean the Shark picked up sooooo much dog hair that the Hoover missed (on my rug, wood floors, & couches). It almost reached the max fill line...So gross but so awesome! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Best vacuum I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Great for hard floors! Picks up all the dust. Good on carpets. Works OK on shag or deep pile rugs, needs a few passes to get it all out of the deep pile; but it will get it! Super light, easy to move around. Easy to empty. Primary roller bar needs to be popped out washed every now and again if you have a lot of hard flooring in your house and messy kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleanup when you don't want to lug out the 'whole house built-in vacuum'
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item due to the fact that our built-in vacuum, which still works quite well for deep cleaning, is just too bulky and heavy for light, quick cleanups. My wife mostly uses the Shark Rocket and is happy with how it cleans. Her only complaint is that it doesn't stand up on it's own and she has to lay it down whenever she is not actually using it. Otherwise, we are quite pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this vacuum! It's the perfect size for my little studio, and works great. It's light, maneuverable, and has excellent suction. Just be careful it doesn't eat your throw rugs - it started to gobble up one of my more heavy duty ones. I find that using the upholstery attachment works best for this though. Think the only thing that could make this vacuum better is if it was cordless, although I know my boyfriend would beg to differ.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with all of the attachments listed!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the vacuum today. I absolutely love it!! However..... it DOES NOT come with all of the attachments that it says it should in this listing. It only comes with the crevice tool and upholstery tool. I mainly ordered this one because it says that it includes all of the attachments. Under product information “included components” it says it comes with the true pet motorized brush, under appliance brush, dusting tool, etc. none are included!!! I called Shark support who said I needed to talk to Amazon, and amazon won’t do anything about it either. Disappointed Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: HV382 was not in the box. Hv380 was!!
customer_reviews.text: box marked HV382 Shark, inner box was a manufacturer box with a shark Hv380, a lesser model with 2 tools. this was the second try. I got the same thing as before. so I guess Amazon has a shipment from china with all HV380's in a box clearly marked HV382. go somewhere else if you want the HV382.
customer_reviews.author: bcar

customer_reviews.title: Great for both hardwood and carpet.
customer_reviews.text: A little top heavy, but perfect for me. The ability to switch from hardwood to rugs is easy and perfect. The tools are good and easy to use as well. Only drawback is the dust collection bin is rather small, so you have to watch it if you're doing a lot of vacuuming and/or have a lot of dog hair. The hardwood function is particularly good: no brush but a velour-type roller bar that has enough suction to pick up dust invisible to the naked eye.
customer_reviews.author: GBM

customer_reviews.title: fantastic little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's my second Shark Rocket and they improved an already good thing. Works well on my hardwood and tile floors. Also really picks up on my room rug. I have a dog and 4 cats and hair is no problem. It's lightweight and easy to maneuver. It really socks in a good way!
customer_reviews.author: lawana Peace

customer_reviews.title: Great on hardwood and carpet.. check your settings
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seemed to work very well for our hardwood floors and carpeting. Make sure you're using the correct settings for the floor types. Picked up a lot of dust we didn't know was there. Very much too heavy, as expected. May become a slight workout for your arms for longer cleaning sessions. Disappointed though as the "onboard hair removal tool" seems to be missing from all the packaging and is not in the compartment it's supposed to be in. So for that, 4/5 due to incomplete packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Edri_joy

customer_reviews.title: The front red brush stopped spinning
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 shark vacuum cleaners since I own a cleaning business. I have never left a review on any amazon purchase. I loved this vacuum and it worked well. A few months after purchasing the vacuum the front red brush stopped working. While it is still usable you can't accurately get under counters etc since there is nothing that pushes the debris back. I went ahead and bought another one in Nov just thinking I got a lemon and sure enough the red brush stopped spinning on that one as well. I called Shark and for $39 I ordered another base. I really think this particular model is not built well and is poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocket Duo
customer_reviews.text: I loved the performance of this vacuum! It is extremely light and has nice suction, the green indicator light helps you know that the brush roll is clear of debris. Clean up is a real breeze as well as storage. A must have for anyone looking for a handy vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Seth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy about it so far, have had it for a few months. Definitely deals with cat hair very well and doesn't take up much space which was crucial for New York apartment. I love how thought through the brush compartment is - easy to open and take the brush out to remove hair with a little tool that nest right inside, i do use scissors to cut through the hair as well. On a slight down side it is a bit heavy in the hand and if i wanna vacuum the whole apartment in one take my hand gets tired.
customer_reviews.author: Redfoxcub

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacuum cleaner-EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum cleaner-EVER! Picks up everything, compact, plenty of attachments, 30 ft cord, just to name some major pluses. Very impressive and reasonably priced compared to so many machines that do nothing. You are going to love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The day it arrived I had vacuumed using my old vacuum. Immediately after getting my Shark and I used it and I was so surprised to see how much cleaner my floors and carpets looked and felt after. It’s a life saver with let hair. It’s so light weight. I do love the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Arraiga

product_meta.title: Shark HV382 Rocket DuoClean Ultra-Light Corded (Non-Cordless) Bagless Carpet and Hard Floor with Hand Vacuum, Charcoal
product_meta.description: The Shark Rocket Complete with Duo Clean Technology gives you two brush rolls working in unison to remove the three types of dirt from your floors and carpets: large, small and stuck-on particles. At 10 lbs. , this ultra-lightweight upright vacuum easily converts into a handheld vacuum for versatile floor-to-ceiling cleaning. It also has powerful LED lights on the handheld vacuum and nozzle, brush roll access for quick and easy maintenance, and a pet multi-tool to capture embedded pet hair on surfaces. Item is Corded Product (Non-cordless) Accessories Included: Handheld Vacuum, Motorized Floor Nozzle, Wand, Onboard Storage Clip, 12" Crevice Tool, Pet Multi-Tool and Wall mount
feature_bullets: Duoclean technology: dual brushroll system deep cleans carpets and directly engages floors for a polished look.
Brushroll garage for easy access to the brushroll for maintenance.
Pet multi tool; Designed to capture embedded pet hair on all surfaces
Led lights on the floor nozzle and handheld vacuum to help spot hidden debris throughout your home
Ultra lightweight it converts into a 4.5 pounds handheld vacuum for versatile above floor cleaning.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,381 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: * TruePet® Mini Motorized Brush * Under-appliance wand * Dusting brush * Duster crevice tool * Upholstery tool * Onboard storage clip * Accessories Bag * Wall mount
